title: Under Armour Men's Performance Polo 3.0 Long Sleeve
description: Smooth, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a textured snag-free finish
4-way stretch material moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast

Smooth, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a textured snag-free finish. 4-way stretch material moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Durable ribbed knit collar. Body: 93% Polyester/7% Elastane. Collar: 100% Polyester. 93% Polyester/7% Elastane.
